goals__remit: Predețeanu & Partners offers strategic communication services in the fields of public affairs and public relations. The company is built around a core of specialists with high expertise in the field of reputation management. The company is aiming to support the development of a transparent and constructive dialogue of the clients with various types of institutions at the level of authorities, diplomats, media representatives and business environment.
